name: Platform game"engine"
description:
These are two "prototypes", or "engines", for a plaform-game I wanted to make with love2d a few years ago and that I had to quit because I hadn't got enough spare time to even design it.

Platform_20180427_64bit has enemies too but no player vs enemies collision detection. The scrolling routine moved the background.

Platform_3_20190918_64bit is a bit more refined because the scrolling routine moves the camera. Unfortunately no enemies were added, but the player can shoot.

Arrows = move
S = shoot
A = jump

D = toggles debug info on/off
